row.process:
!Common logging
!Host :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Host" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_HOST# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!Port :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Port" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_PORT# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!CA Certificate :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "CA Certificate" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_CA_CERT# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!TLS Certificate :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "TLS Certificate" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_TLS_CERT# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!TLS Key :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "TLS Key" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_TLS_KEY# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!Skip TLS Verification :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Skip TLS Verification" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DKR_SWARM_SKIP_CERT# :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
